categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Oorrl Morm was a male Ithorian Jedi Master.

Morm served the Jedi Order on Ossus, crafting the Greelwood Saber during his time there. Wielding the weapon in battle on Ithor against pirates, Morm bought the Republic Navy enough time to launch an effective attack on the pirates, at the cost of his life. Morm's weapon was returned to Ossus and stored within the Great Jedi Library's Chamber of Antiquities.
